description.@en: Transmogrified, the flesh takes on a cadaverous, scaly appearance. Your heart begins to beat slower and your flesh grows colder to the touch. Given over to this terrible curse, your body must cast aside its skin, as you now molt upon every new moon. Naturally, the disgusting countenance you’ve taken on raises a horrendous social stigma, unless you take great pains to keep it hidden from others. But it also has introduced a terrible condition where your body is constantly half-paralyzed, your muscles revolting at the mind’s wishes to move.

effect.@en:
After suffering 10 or more Corruption in a game session or from Stress, Fear or Terror, those afflicted with this Disorder cannot add their [BB] to Damage Threshold.
  At any time, those afflicted with The Flesh Revolts ignore Bleeding and Injuries. Each time they take advantage of this benefit, they gain 6 Corruption.
